description: The perfect side dish to roast beef and yorkshire puddings, this roast parsnip and sweet potato recipe will complete your meal.
name: Roast Parsnip & Sweet Potato Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter, mustard and syrup in a saucepan until butter has melted and mixture is sizzling. Drizzle over veg and return to oven for 5-10 minutes. Serve.
